TunableList.name: OCCULT_DATA
TunableList.description: A mapping of occult types to data that affect a Sim's behavior.

TunableEnum.name: key
TunableEnum.description: The occult type that this entry applies to.

TunableTuple.name: value
TunableTuple.description: Occult data specific to this occult type.

Tunable.name: add_current_occult_trait_to_babies
Tunable.display: Add Current Occult Trait To Babies
Tunable.description: If True, babies will automatically be given the tuned Current Occult Trait when the tuned Occult Trait is added to them. This is currently only meant for aliens.

TunableList.name: additional_occult_traits
TunableList.description: A list of traits that will also be applied to a Sim of this occult type. These will only be applied if this Sim is the full occult type and not just a partial occult. It also doesn't matter if they are in their current occult form or not. These traits will be applied regardless.

Tunable.name: cas_add_occult_tooltip
Tunable.description: This is the tooltip shown on the cas add occult button

Tunable.name: cas_alternative_form_add_tooltip
Tunable.description: This is the tooltip shown on the cas add alternaive form button

Tunable.name: cas_alternative_form_copy_options_heading
Tunable.display: Cas Alternative Form Copy Options Heading
Tunable.description: This is the header text shown on the cas copy to alternative form options panel

Tunable.name: cas_alternative_form_copy_tooltip
Tunable.description: This is the tooltip shown on the cas copy to alternative form button. If this is None, it is assumed the player shouldn't be able to copy from their base form into their alternative form.

Tunable.name: cas_alternative_form_delete_confirmation
Tunable.description: This is the text shown in the dialog when deleting the alternative form

Tunable.name: cas_alternative_form_delete_tooltip
Tunable.description: This is the tooltip shown on the cas delete alternaive form button

Tunable.name: cas_alternative_form_link_tooltip
Tunable.description: The tooltip shown in CAS when the alternative form is selected.

Tunable.name: cas_alternative_form_sim_name_tooltip
Tunable.display: Cas Alternative Form Sim Name Tooltip
Tunable.description: This is the tooltip shown on the cas sim skewer alternative form icon

Tunable.name: cas_base_form_copy_tooltip
Tunable.description: This is the tooltip shown on the cas copy to base form button. If this is None, it is assumed the player shouldn't be able to copy from their alternative form into their base form.

Tunable.name: cas_base_form_link_tooltip
Tunable.description: The tooltip shown in CAS when the base form is selected.

Tunable.name: cas_can_delete_alternative_form
Tunable.description: If checked, the Sim's alternative form can be deleted in CAS. If unchecked, the alternative form can't be deleted. If the Occult doesn't have an alternative form, this is ignored.

Tunable.name: cas_default_to_alternative_form
Tunable.description: If checked, this occult type will default to their alternative form when first added to CAS. If left unchecked, the Sim will default to their base form like usual.

Tunable.name: cas_disabled_while_in_alternative_form_tooltip
Tunable.display: Cas Disabled While In Alternative Form Tooltip
Tunable.description: This is the tooltip shown on any cas panels that are disabled when editing the occult alternative form

Tunable.name: cas_invalid_age_warning_body
Tunable.description: The body text for the dialog when an occult Sim attempts to enter an invalid age (i.e. aging a Vampire down to child).

Tunable.name: cas_invalid_age_warning_title
Tunable.description: The title for the dialog when an occult Sim attempts to enter an invalid age (i.e. aging a Vampire down to child).

Tunable.name: cas_molecule_disabled_while_in_alternative_form_tooltip
Tunable.display: Cas Molecule Disabled While In Alternative Form Tooltip
Tunable.description: This is the tooltip shown on the molecule when it's disabled due to the current Sim being in their alternate occult form.

Tunable.name: cas_selected_tooltip
Tunable.description: The tooltip to display on the occult button when one is selected

TunableVariant.name: current_occult_trait
TunableVariant.description: If enabled then this occult will have an alternate form controlled by a trait.

Tunable.name: enabled
Tunable.description: That trait that all Sims currently in this occult are equipped with.

Tunable.name: experience_statistic
Tunable.description: A reference to a ranked statistic to be used for tracking the experience and level/ranking up.

TunableEnum.name: fallback_outfit_category
TunableEnum.description: The outfit category to default to when the sim changes occult forms and is unable to stay in the same outfit.

Tunable.name: generate_new_human_form_on_add
Tunable.display: Generate New Human Form On Add
Tunable.description: If True, humans being given this occult for the first time will have a new human form generated for them (i.e. Aliens need a new human form when they change to an alien). If false, their human/base form will remain the same (i.e. Vampires should remain similar in appearance).

TunableEnum.name: min_age_for_occult_ui
TunableEnum.description: The minimum age a sim can be in order for occult-specific UI to be used.

TunableVariant.name: occult_form_outfit_category_blacklist
TunableVariant.description: Blacklist outfit categories which are not supported by the occult. For example: Mermaids are always swimming, so everyday wear is not supported.

TunableTuple.name: enabled
TunableTuple.description: The list of forbidden outfits for this occult form.

TunableVariant.name: threshold
TunableVariant.description: Tunable option for how many items must be in the blacklist for the blacklist to fail when testing a collection of items. By default, only one object needs to be in the list.

TunableTuple.name: threshold
TunableTuple.description: When testing a collection of items, the number of items in that collection that are in the blacklist must pass this threshold test for the blacklist to disallow them all.

TunableEnum.name: comparison
TunableEnum.description: The comparison to perform against the value.

Tunable.name: occult_name
Tunable.description: This is the localized name used for the Occult Selector

Tunable.name: occult_trait
Tunable.description: The trait that all Sims that have this occult are equipped with.

Tunable.name: part_occult_trait
Tunable.description: If not None, this allows the tuning of a trait to identify a Sim that is partly this occult. The trait that identifies a Sim that is partly occult. For any part occult trait, we will apply genetics that are half occult and half non-occult.

Tunable.name: perk
Tunable.description: Buck type for the daywalker vampire.

Tunable.name: trait
Tunable.description: Trait for vampire.
